casebody.data:
BUILDING ERECTION SERVICES COMPANY, INC., Appellant,
v.
WALTON CONSTRUCTION COMPANY, INC. and American Home Assurance Company, Appellees. Walton Construction Company, Inc., Appellee,
v.
Building Erection Services Company, Inc., Appellant. No. 117,839 Court of Appeals of Kansas. Opinion filed July 20, 2018.

Reversed.
